package com.yulin.com;

import java.io.File;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.MalformedURLException;

public class FeleDemo1 {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		String path = "demo/text2.txt";

		File file = new File(path);
		if (!file.exists()) {
			file.mkdir();

		}

		String path1 = "demo/text1.txt";
		String path2 = "demo/text2.txt";
		File file1 = new File(path1);
		File file2 = new File(path2);
		try {
			file1.createNewFile();
			file2.createNewFile();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		System.out.println(file1.listFiles());
		System.out.println(file1.list());
		System.out.println(file1.toString());
		try {
			System.out.println(file1.toURL());
		} catch (MalformedURLException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		System.out.println(file2.delete());

		String path4 = "demo/text.txt";

		File file4 = new File(path4);
		file1.renameTo(file4);
		
		

	}

}
